subject: refactor(conventions): consolidate AI import guide into single source of truth
body:
Previously, AI import formatting guidance existed in two places:
src/data/conventions.ts (displayed in-app) and
docs/ai-research-output-guide.md (standalone doc). Both served the
same audience (AI assistants) for the same purpose (formatting import
data) but had divergent content â€” the guide contained title vs tags
vs properties decision rules, item heuristics, connection guidance,
and import matching explanations that the conventions text lacked.

Merged all guide content into conventions.ts as shared constants
(FIELD_GUIDANCE, ITEM_GUIDANCE, CONNECTION_GUIDANCE, IMPORT_MATCHING)
composed into each format's content. Both JSON and Markdown documents
are now identical except for the format-specific section. Deleted the
duplicate guide file. Updated CLAUDE.md references.
